name: Mansion Blood
description:
Mansion Blood     You take on the role of a kid who was kidnapped and imprisoned in a mansion in the middle of the forest. You must solve the puzzle and find all the key pieces. and escape from this blood-stained mansion Your memory will be very helpful in playing this game. wish you luck    Hope you enjoy our game. Let us know if there are any bugs or if there are suggestions, down in the comments. Thanks for playing

How to play

A  -  walk to the left

D  -  walk to the right

W  -  go up the stairs

S   -  go down the stairs

E  -  Collect

Left shift -run

How to win

Find all 7 keys.

How to lose

you got killed
